Posted By: TheRisenDerp (5/10/2012 9:16:13 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
EDIT: Having just drafted a Gisela last week, I feel I must say-  
HOLY CRAP.  
She won me a game where I was at 4 life, and my opponent at almost 30.  
Needless to say, that guy *hated* her... and I fell in love.  
  
She'll make for a \*great\* Boros General-  
her only real drawback is vulnerability to removal,  
which can be compensated for with [Lightning Greaves](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Greaves) or the like.  
  
Also, I \*really\* want to run her with [Mirror Gallery](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mirror Gallery) and [Infinite Reflection](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Infinite Reflection),  
just to make the game impossible to play without a calculator.  
  
Or just add [Hostility](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hostility) and cast [Comet Storm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Comet Storm)-  
6x damage should make just about any opponent scoop.
posts.html:
EDIT: Having just drafted a Gisela last week, I feel I must say-
HOLY CRAP.
She won me a game where I was at 4 life, and my opponent at almost 30.
Needless to say, that guy hated her... and I fell in love.

She'll make for a *great* Boros General-
her only real drawback is vulnerability to removal,
which can be compensated for with Lightning Greaves or the like.

Also, I *really* want to run her with Mirror Gallery and Infinite Reflection,
just to make the game impossible to play without a calculator.

Or just add Hostility and cast Comet Storm-
6x damage should make just about any opponent scoop.

Rating:

posts.post_content: Boy, they're really catering to the EDH crowd in this set. Along with [Bruna, Light of Alabaster](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bruna, Light of Alabaster), this card is too expensive to see play in Standard. But she is very welcome in a number of EDH decks -- both as a R/W general, and as a minion for [Kaalia of the Vast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kaalia of the Vast).

posts.post_content:
i have a [kaalia of the vast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=kaalia of the vast) edh deck. this is a [furnace of rath](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=furnace of rath) on an angelic stick that only hurts my opponents and protects me at the same time.  
  
there are not enough words to describe what i am feeling right now.  
  
shame bubbles and buttercup dont synergise with kaalia. so now i have to find a way to break the laws of time and space so that i can have a all three with kaalia.  
and i just realised that there still is not a 4 colour legendary, so avacyn can not lead the powerpuff girls into battle in edh. unless you use one of the five colour commanders. hum, [Child of Alara](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Child of Alara) makes a nice mayor stand in, and synergises with avacyn. heh. heh heh. hehehehehehehehHEHEHEHEHE**HEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE!**

posts.post_content:
She gives Razia a run for her money.  
But why bit them against ech other when can you use BOTH?  
They work decent toghether actually. Gisela yield Razia that she NOT made of cardboard (duh) and Razia's can actually smack meanies on another side of the board for a whooping six!  
  
Also it's note worthy that her first ability is kinda political in multiplayer, with opponents smacking each other for double damage.  
  
It's nice knowing that with that angel lady and [Slayer's Stronghold](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Slayer's Stronghold) (and mabe, mabe other shinies in Return to Ravnica?) Boros can hit a buck once again.

posts.post_content:
Yeah my friend used to love [Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger)  
It was his favorite, he used to praise it, and worship it.  
He downloaded a wallpaper of Vorinclex and put it on his phone to admire it whenever he wanted  
SO one day he was on the bus staring at Vorinclex and then he randomly went WTF!  
Because he finally noticed how Vorinclex had baby hands coming out of his armpits   
He was so disgusted by him that he disowned Vorinclex and now he just sits at the bottom of a card binder  
Now he's doing the same to Gisela since she has similar ability except with damage instead of mana. He says that now the only thing that'll get him to quit liking GIsela is if he notices like a tiny dick dangling under her croch or something

Posted By: dlgn (5/13/2012 7:11:34 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@BorosGeneral   
Though in this case, the lack of double-strike makes her a card WotC is willing to make, and 2x damage first strike is BETTER than double-strike, in my opinion.  
  
And I actually think the second ability is the better one, since it helps buy you time, and, as mentioned before, in multiplayer formats it forces players to think twice about attacking you when you take half and they take double, and instead choose to attack for double on another person preemptively.  
  
Also, I love how she's around the same power level as BS angel, maybe better, and yet there is nowhere **near** the levels of rage that BS got...
posts.html:
@BorosGeneral
Though in this case, the lack of double-strike makes her a card WotC is willing to make, and 2x damage first strike is BETTER than double-strike, in my opinion.

And I actually think the second ability is the better one, since it helps buy you time, and, as mentioned before, in multiplayer formats it forces players to think twice about attacking you when you take half and they take double, and instead choose to attack for double on another person preemptively.

Also, I love how she's around the same power level as BS angel, maybe better, and yet there is nowhere near the levels of rage that BS got...
